SCTX - Script Source:
SCN mwShrineGhostgateScript

; Shrine of Pride.
; Applied to the tribunal shrine associated with the quest.
; This script is minimally functional and still partly in Morrowind Scripting Language.
; It can be reworked when the Dunmer Temple quests are rebuilt.
; Morrowind bug has been removed.  This should now only take just one soul gem, not as many as five.

short button
short questionState

Begin OnActivate

	if ( questionState == 0 )

		if ( Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty1Petty > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty2Lesser > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty3Common > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty4Greater > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		if ( Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty5Grand > 0 )
			MessageBox "Would you like to donate a Soul Gem and ask for a blessing?" "Yes" "No"
			Set questionState to 1
			Return
		endif

		MessageBox "Here Vivec, Sotha Sil, and Almalexia used many soul gems to create the Ghostfence, an unwavering symbol of Dunmer pride."
		Set questionState to 0

	endif

End


Begin GameMode

	if ( questionState == 1 )

		set button to GetButtonPressed

		if ( button == 1 )
			Set questionState to 0
			Return
		endif

		if ( button == 0 )

			if Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty1Petty > 0 && questionState == 1
				Player.RemoveItem SoulGemEmpty1Petty 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player  ; Fortify Magicka, Shield
				SetStage fbmwTTSevenGraces 18
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

			if Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty2Lesser > 0 && questionState == 1
				Player.RemoveItem SoulGemEmpty2Lesser 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player
;			Journal TT_Ghostgate 100
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

			if Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty3Common > 0 && questionState == 1
				Player.RemoveItem SoulGemEmpty3Common 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player
;			Journal TT_Ghostgate 100
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

			if Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty4Greater > 0 && questionState == 1
				Player.RemoveItem SoulGemEmpty4Greater 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player
;			Journal TT_Ghostgate 100
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

			if Player.GetItemCount SoulGemEmpty5Grand > 0 && questionState == 1
				Player.RemoveItem SoulGemEmpty5Grand 1
				MessageBox "The Grace of Pride: Thank you for your pride, Lord Vivec. I shall not doubt myself, or my people, or my gods, and shall insist upon them, and my ancient rights."
				Cast 0shrineUghostgateUsp Player
;			Journal TT_Ghostgate 100
				Set questionState to 0
			endif

		endif

	endif

End
;<CSEBlock>
;<CSECaretPos> 27 </CSECaretPos>
;</CSEBlock>
